DOC.criteria: All woman group ( A ) takenthe oral contraceptive pill do routinely past three month . All woman group ( B ) normal menstrual cycle ; use nonhormonal contraceptive method . Their body mass index exceed 30 Kg/m2 . All woman normal menstrual cycle 2532 day past 3 month . They stand independently . Respiratory heart problem . Skeletal deformityorusing assistive device . Visual vestibular system affection . Cognition problem . Previous surgery back and/or low limb . Genital breast cancer active liver disease .
